verses.verse: A Psalm of David. To Jehovah is the earth, and the fullness of it; the world, and those who live in it.
For He has founded it on the seas and established it upon the rivers.
Who shall go up into the hill of Jehovah? And who shall rise in His holy place?
The clean of palms and the pure of heart; who has not lifted up his soul to vanity and has not sworn deceit.
He shall lift up the blessing from Jehovah, and righteousness from the God of his salvation.
This is the generation of those seeking Him; they seek Your face, O God of Jacob. Selah.
Lift up your heads, O gates; and be lifted up, O everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.
Who is this King of glory? Jehovah strong and mighty! Jehovah mighty in battle!
Lift up your heads, O gates; even lift up, O everlasting doors, and the King of glory shall come in.
Who is this King of glory? Jehovah of Hosts, He is the King of glory. Selah.
